publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-945.2 Lewis Macdonald: Tourism—As an amendment to motion (S3M-945) in the name of Jim Mather, after "destinations" insert "recognises the importance to tourism of improved access for visitors to Scotland by land, sea and air; notes with concern the Scottish Government’s failure to propose an alternative to the Route Development Fund or to increase the marketing budget of VisitScotland over the next three years; believes that improved skills and training are the key to achieving higher standards".
